imdb.title: Venus Versus Virus
imdb.plot: Pricked by a special broach, Sumire finds herself able to see evil spirits (viruses). Lucia exterminates viruses and mistakenly shoots Sumire with an antiviral bullet, which transforms her into a super-powered antibody and gets he...

episodes.title: Aoi sasoi
episodes.plot: After a rash of disappearances, the Venus Vanguard investigates rumors of a strange, dark presence. Lucia will need Sumire's help to defeat the threat.

episodes.title: Ikei sekai
episodes.plot: Sumire's weary of the testing meant to help her control her Berserker tendencies and longs for a normal life. Of course, it's hard to be normal when even a day at school could result in a battle with a Virus.

episodes.title: Irai kehai
episodes.plot: When her brother's personality changes in disturbing ways, a young girl seeks the help of the Venus Vanguard. Sumire and Lucia think a Virus could be at the root of the problem.

episodes.title: Memai deai
episodes.plot: Sumire's first encounter with Lucia is revisited, revealing the circumstances that led to Sumire joining the Venus Vanguard.

episodes.title: Tooi tsukai
episodes.plot: A new threat - Luca - emerges, and she won't be easily defeated. When she attacks Yoshiki, Sumire must take drastic measures to confront the Virus.

episodes.title: Nigai higai
episodes.plot: Lucia is severely injured after an encounter with the powerful Guy. Their next confrontation is going no better until Sumire comes to the rescue.

episodes.title: Fukai omoi
episodes.plot: While Lucia recovers from the injuries sustained during her battle with Guy, Nahashi recalls a time eighteen years in the past, before Lucia was born.

episodes.title: Kurai negai
episodes.plot: Lucia distances herself from Sumire and decides to take on Guy by herself - and walks into a trap set by Luca!

episodes.title: Amai nioi
episodes.plot: Lucia is hesitant to celebrate her birthday, which falls on the same day as Sumire's. Eventually, she warms to the idea and the birthday girls team up to make a cake.

episodes.title: Gokai nerai
episodes.plot: Sumire thinks the world of Yoshiki, and they're growing closer with each passing day. Lucia isn't nearly as fond of Yoshiki and can't help but think he's got dubious intentions.

episodes.title: Gisei satsui
episodes.plot: Nahashi, Laura, and Lucia try to find Sumire after she sets out to find the vanished Yoshiki. Time is of the essence - the threat of Lucif looms!

episodes.title: Shiroi mirai
episodes.plot: During her confrontation with Lucif, Lucia learns the truth of her past - and vows to destroy her father!
